name: 10,000 Zombies!
description:
10,000 Zombies! is a simple timed clicker game. You have one minute to destroy the zombie horde to save your city of Walkerville. During this encounter, if the number of your citizens OR number of defenders reaches zero, you lose.

Every game is different - it is impossible for two game sessions to be exactly alike...

Credits:

10,000 Zombies! was written using QUANDARY.

Cover title font is Creepster by FONT DINER.

The text font is Libre Caslon by IMPALLARI TYPE.

All images from PNGGURU.
